scripts.install: npm install --loglevel error && npm audit fix --loglevel error
scripts.hot: node node_modules/cross-env/src/bin/cross-env NODE_ENV=development ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT=Development node node_modules/webpack-dev-server/bin/webpack-dev-server --config webpack.config.js --hot --inline
scripts.dbg: node node_modules/cross-env/src/bin/cross-env NODE_ENV=development ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT=Development dotnet watch run -c Debug
scripts.rls: node node_modules/cross-env/src/bin/cross-env NODE_ENV=production ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT=Production dotnet run -c Release
scripts.build:dbg: node node_modules/cross-env/src/bin/cross-env NODE_ENV=development ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT=Development node node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack
scripts.build:rls: node node_modules/cross-env/src/bin/cross-env NODE_ENV=production ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT=Production node node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack
scripts.clean:win: dotnet clean && (if exist bin rd /s /q bin) & (if exist obj rd /s /q obj) & (if exist publish rd /s /q publish) & (if exist wwwroot rd /s /q wwwroot)
scripts.clean:unix: dotnet clean && rm -rf bin/ obj/ publish/ wwwroot/
scripts.lint:check: node node_modules/eslint/bin/eslint -c ./.eslintrc.js ./*.js ClientApp/**/*.js ClientApp/**/*.vue && node node_modules/stylelint/bin/stylelint ClientApp/**/*.css
scripts.lint:fix: node node_modules/eslint/bin/eslint -c ./.eslintrc.js --fix ./*.js ClientApp/**/*.js ClientApp/**/*.vue && node node_modules/stylelint/bin/stylelint --fix ClientApp/**/*.css
